title: Group portrait of members of the Matrons Council of the Omega Grand Chapter, eight women, including Hazel Stovall, Mary Smith, Mamie Smalls presenting check to Esther Green, Lula Miller, Willa Mae Wright, Sarah Ogden, and Ada Freeman, and three men, including Wayman Frazier, Luther Rice, and Frederick Stanford, standing behind table covered with desserts and crepe paper turkey, in interior with cruet and vase patterned curtains, another version
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
